snippet: The nation’s top high school baseball prospect will have a 19-strikeout no-hitter he threw this week erased over a transfer rule.
abstract: New Jersey high school sports officials nullify no-hitter thrown by Barnegat High School pitcher Jason Groome, America’s top high school baseball prospect, after ruling he violated transfer rules by playing at Florida academy in 2015.
lead_paragraph: The nation’s top high school baseball prospect will have a 19-strikeout no-hitter he threw this week erased over a transfer rule.

headline.main: Ruling Strips Jason Groome, Top Prospect, of No-Hitter
headline.print_headline: Ruling Strips Top Prospect of No-Hitter
